§ 6857. Authorization of appropriations There are authorized to be appropriated—(1) to the Secretary of the Interior to carry out this chapter—(A) $2,500,000 for fiscal year 2022; and
(B) $5,500,000 for each of fiscal years 2023 through 2025;
(2) to the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out this chapter—(A) $2,500,000 for fiscal year 2022; and
(B) $5,500,000 for each of fiscal years 2023 through 2025; and
(3) to the Secretary of the Army to carry out this chapter—(A) $1,500,000 for fiscal year 2022; and
(B) $2,500,000 for each of fiscal years 2023 through 2025.
(Pub. L. 117–114, § 8, Apr. 29, 2022, 136 Stat. 1177.)
